Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Ok this is other poll, please answer 
this, 'cause we (The volunteers and 
me) will take note what to do to new 
site. The new site has to have: 

  o Exactly the same that current, obviously  improved and updated 
  o More things that current. (Send me a mail in order to know what sections) 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1087050  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
